nodes.text: An avian species with white feathers and a blue beak could be found wild on the planet Esseles. The species possessed long, thin tails and had blue skin around their yellow eyes. The species also had a multicolored crest above their beak. In the year 19 BBY, flocks of the species of birds could be found flying in the mountainous regions near Esseles' capital city of Calamar, as well as near the family villa of the wealthy Human Dezono Qua.

This bird species first appeared in the fifth issue of the Path to Nowhere story arc of the Star Wars: Dark Times comic book series. The issue was written by Randy Stradley under the name Mike Harrison and illustrated by Douglas Wheatley. Released in 2007, the issue did not state the species' name or level of sentience.
